title: Chicago Budget Talks Stall Over $1.2 Billion Deficit Ahead of Year-End Deadline
description: Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson is floating changes to his corporate head tax proposal as he and the city council are at an impasse over how to close a nearly $1.2 billion deficit.
content: Chicago Mayor Brandon Johnson is floating changes to his corporate head tax proposal as he and the city council are at an impasse over how to close a nearly $1.2 billion deficit.
